mapper.select: SELECT h.apt_seq AS sptSeq, d.sido_name AS sggName, d.dong_name AS umdName, h.umd_nm, h.jibun, h.road_nm_sgg_cd, h.road_nm, h.road_nm_bonbun, h.road_nm_bubun, h.apt_nm, h.build_year, CAST(h.latitude AS DECIMAL(10, 6)) AS latitude, CAST(h.longitude AS DECIMAL(10, 6)) AS longitude, CONCAT(d.sido_name, ' ', d.gugun_name, ' ', d.dong_name, ' ', h.jibun) AS pullName FROM houseinfos h JOIN dongcodes d ON CONCAT(h.sgg_cd, h.umd_cd) = d.dong_code WHERE h.sgg_cd = #{sggCd} AND h.umd_cd = #{umdCd}

SELECT h.apt_seq AS sptSeq, d.sido_name AS sggName, d.dong_name AS umdName, h.umd_nm, h.jibun, h.road_nm_sgg_cd, h.road_nm, h.road_nm_bonbun, h.road_nm_bubun, h.apt_nm, h.build_year, h.latitude AS latitude, h.longitude AS longitude, CONCAT(d.sido_name, ' ', d.gugun_name, ' ', d.dong_name, ' ', h.jibun) AS fullName FROM houseinfos h JOIN dongcodes d ON CONCAT(h.sgg_cd, h.umd_cd) = d.dong_code WHERE h.latitude BETWEEN #{x1} AND #{x2} AND h.longitude BETWEEN #{y1} AND #{y2} ORDER BY sptSeq
